chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), FiniteT X -> (forall x : X, P x \/ ~ P x) -> FiniteT {x : X | P x}

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
finite_dec_exists : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), FiniteT X -> (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {exists x : X, P x} + {forall x : X, ~ P x}
finite_dec_forall : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop), FiniteT X -> (forall x : X, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> {forall x : X, P x} + {exists x : X, ~ P x}
FiniteT_ind : forall P : Type -> Prop, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
FiniteT_sind : forall P : Type -> SProp, P False -> (forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T -> P (option T)) -> (forall (X Y : Type) (f1 : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> P X -> invertible f1 -> P Y) -> forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> P T
surj_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> surjective f -> (forall y1 y2 : Y, y1 = y2 \/ y1 <> y2) -> FiniteT Y
finite_eq_dec : forall X : Type, FiniteT X -> forall x y : X, {x = y} + {x <> y}
bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y
dependent_choice : forall (X : Set) (R : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {y : X | R x y}) -> forall x0 : X, {f : nat -> X | f 0 = x0 /\ (forall n : nat, R (f n) (f (S n)))}
FiniteT_img : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> (forall y1 y2 : Y, y1 = y2 \/ y1 <> y2) -> Finite Y (Im Full_set f)
Inductive FiniteT : Type -> Prop := empty_finite : FiniteT False | add_finite : forall T : Type, FiniteT T -> FiniteT (option T) | bij_finite : forall (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y), FiniteT X -> invertible f -> FiniteT Y Arguments FiniteT _%type_scope Arguments add_finite _%type_scope Arguments bij_finite (_ _)%type_scope _%function_scope
surjective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => forall y : Y, exists x : X, f x = y : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments surjective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
constructive_definite_description : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (exists ! x : A, P x) -> {x : A | P x}
eq_sig_fst : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x1 x2 : X) (H1 : P x1) (H2 : P x2), exist P x1 H1 = exist P x2 H2 -> x1 = x2
Inductive invertible (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) : Prop := intro_invertible : forall g : Y -> X, (forall x : X, g (f x) = x) -> (forall y : Y, f (g y) = y) -> invertible f Arguments invertible {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments intro_invertible {X Y}%type_scope (_ _ _ _)%function_scope
ssrbool.classic_pick : forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Prop), ssrbool.classically ({x : T | P x} + (forall x : T, ~ P x))
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_of_sig2 : forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x & Q x} -> {x : A | P x}
sigT_of_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> {x : A & P x}
ssrfun.tag_of_sig : forall (I : Type) (P : I -> Prop), {x : I | P x} -> {x : I & P x}
sig_of_sigT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A & P x} -> {x : A | P x}
Im_intro : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (x : U), In X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In (Im X f) y
eq_sig_snd : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Prop) (x1 x2 : X) (H1 : P x1) (H2 : P x2) (H : exist P x1 H1 = exist P x2 H2), eq_rect x1 P H1 x2 (eq_sig_fst H) = H2
sig_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> SProp), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
eq_sigT_sig_eq : forall (X : Type) (P : X -> Type) (x1 x2 : X) (H1 : P x1) (H2 : P x2), existT P x1 H1 = existT P x2 H2 < -> {H : x1 = x2 | eq_rect x1 P H1 x2 H = H2}
Finite_ind : forall (U : Type) (P : Ensemble U -> Prop), P Empty_set -> (forall A : Ensemble U, Finite U A -> P A -> forall x : U, ~ In A x -> P (Add A x)) -> forall e : Ensemble U, Finite U e -> P e
ssrbool.all_sig_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
ssrbool.all_sig_cond : forall (I T : Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : I -> T -> Prop), T -> (forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> {y : T | P x y}) -> {f : I -> T | forall x : I, is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
